Name: After Eight
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
15 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Shot glass .
Review: Looks like mouthwash but tastes like liquid After Eight chocolates. Dessert and after dinner minty drink in one.
Nutrition: One serving of After Eight contains 115 calories
